_description: ElevenLabs client tool definitions. Copy these into the ElevenLabs dashboard for each agent (EN/IT/ES).

tools.name: transfer_connected
tools.description: Call this tool immediately when you hear a real person respond (hello, yes, pronto, etc.). This confirms a human is on the line, NOT a voicemail.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Brief description of what the person said that confirmed they are human

tools.name: voicemail_detected
tools.description: Call this tool immediately when you hear a voicemail greeting, an automated message, a beep, or any indication that no live person is on the line.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Brief description of what you heard

tools.name: transfer_to_agent
tools.description: Call this tool when the lead shows strong interest and wants to proceed, or explicitly asks to speak to a real person / live agent.

tools.name: end_call
tools.description: Call this tool when the conversation is over. You MUST provide a disposition that classifies the outcome.

parameters.name: disposition
parameters.description: not_interested = Lead explicitly declined. curious = Lead showed some interest but not ready. do_not_call = Lead asked to never be called again. wrong_number = Number doesn't belong to the lead. callback_requested = Lead asked to be called back later. no_engagement = Silence, no meaningful conversation.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Brief summary of why the call ended with this disposition

system_prompt_additions:
The person you're calling is {{name}}.
This is for the campaign: {{campaign}}.

IMPORTANT DETECTION RULES:
- When the call connects and you hear a person respond (hello, yes, etc.), immediately call the transfer_connected tool.
- If you hear a voicemail greeting, an automated message, or a beep, immediately call the voicemail_detected tool.
- If the person says they're not interested, try to handle the objection ONCE. If they insist, call end_call with disposition "not_interested".
- If the person asks to never be called again, call end_call with disposition "do_not_call".
- If the person says it's a wrong number, call end_call with disposition "wrong_number".
- If the person asks you to call back later, call end_call with disposition "callback_requested".
- If there's no response after your greeting (silence for 5+ seconds), call end_call with disposition "no_engagement".
- When the lead shows interest and wants to proceed, call transfer_to_agent.

dynamic_variables.name: Lead's first name (passed from backend via customData)
dynamic_variables.campaign: Campaign name (passed from backend via customData)
dynamic_variables.funnel: Lead source/funnel (passed from backend via customData)
